images.alt:
Where is the Thiradric Needle? It was stored safely in my mud pile, now it’s missing. 

It contains the destructive power of a thousand black suns, a force which — if unleashed — would surely precipitate the complete collapse of the whole realm and the utter annihilation all life within it…

I really need it to complete this piece!!!

Where is the Thiradric Needle? It was stored safely in my mud pile, now it’s missing. 

It contains the destructive power of a thousand black suns, a force which — if unleashed — would surely precipitate the complete collapse of the whole realm and the utter annihilation all life within it…

I really need it to complete this piece!!!

record.text:
I had a great chat with Ruby Dragon @therubydragon.bsky.social 

A rabbit runs past you in a forest. A fox follows, and asks you which way the rabbit ran, what is the right thing to do?

Tell the truth the rabbit gets eaten by the fox! Lie and fox goes hungry!

Ruby Dragon says it's obvious...

1/3

record.text: Interesting. It’s weird now huh. That’s very interesting you’d say that. Weird now! So interesting to me that you’d say that now.

record.text:
I haven't seen The Green Wizard since yesterday... I think he might have left?

I don't consider myself a religious person but even I need to thank The Big Tree for this incredible blessing 🙏
Ugh yeah this is weird now.

Bornt! Bornt try soo hard to be and talk cool. Not cool!

Barnt cool! Mom says barnt cool, brave and strong.

Bornt go away... maybe bornt go steal more of mr chuffy's pies!

I haven't seen The Green Wizard since yesterday... I think he might have left?

I don't consider myself a religious person but even I need to thank The Big Tree for this incredible blessing 🙏

...

"I therefore say to the Fox: 'Know this: the rabbit ran into the heart of the forest, where even your hunger is meaningless.'"

"I shall then consider asserting a flicker of agency in a world that devours meaning: I may burn the forest. Depends how busy I am with other art / work."

Wow!

3/3

record.text:
I had a great chat with Ruby Dragon @therubydragon.bsky.social 

A rabbit runs past you in a forest. A fox follows, and asks you which way the rabbit ran, what is the right thing to do?

Tell the truth the rabbit gets eaten by the fox! Lie and fox goes hungry!

Ruby Dragon says it's obvious...

1/3

Ruby Dragon's response translates to: 

"Know this: to speak the truth is to participate in the fox's hunger. To lie is to assume the burden of the rabbit’s fleeting reprieve. Either way, you are complicit in the abyss."

2/3

Ruby Dragon's response translates to: 

"Know this: to speak the truth is to participate in the fox's hunger. To lie is to assume the burden of the rabbit’s fleeting reprieve. Either way, you are complicit in the abyss."

2/3
